SELECT A.USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.USER_PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD , A.ROLE_CD AS ROLE_CD , A.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , A.LAST_CHNG_ID AS LAST_CHNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM , B.CODE_NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM SCH_INCU.USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCH_INCU.CODE B ON A.ROLE_CD = B.CODE_VAL WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND USER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{userEmail} || '%'
AND ROLE_CD LIKE '%' || #{roleCd} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{startDate} AND TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{endDate}
ORDER BY FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM DESC, USER_EMAIL

SELECT USER_EMAIL , USER_PASSWORD , ROLE_CD , DEL_YN , TO_CHAR(FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , TO_CHAR(LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM FROM SCH_INCU.USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCH_INCU.USER SET USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}, ROLE_CD = #{roleCd}, LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1=1 AND USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH_INCU.USER VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{roleCd}, 'N', 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.delete: UPDATE SCH_INCU.USER SET DEL_YN = 'Y', LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1=1 AND USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
